news.title: Neighbours tell how woman attacked with axe ran bleeding from burning home
news.summary: Neighbours of a woman (50s) who was attacked by a man who broke into her home and then set it alight, have told how she ran bleeding from the burning house.

news.title: Jozef Puska’s wife and wives of his two brothers segregated in Mountjoy over attack fears
news.summary: Three women jailed for withholding information during the Ashling Murphy murder probe have been segregated in the Dochas Women’s Prison and are being kept under 23-hour lockdown for their own protection.

news.title: Fourth outbreak of highly contagious bird flu confirmed on large turkey farm in Laois
news.summary: The Department of Agriculture has confirmed a fourth outbreak of bird flu in a turkey flock in Co Laois.

news.title: Eoin McGee answers: ‘I have saved over €10,000 for my grandchildren, where should I store it to earn the most interest?’
Jamie Braidwood: Cristiano Ronaldo has escaped a World Cup ban and no one is surprised
news.summary: Arrive for dinner, stay for seconds: to the surprise of absolutely no one, Cristiano Ronaldo has been cleared to start in Portugal’s opening match of the World Cup after Fifa’s disciplinary committee ruled to suspend the final two games of his three-game ban.

news.title: One hospitalised after vehicle-Luas crash as bus collides with tram in separate incident
news.summary: A passenger was taken to hospital following a collision between a Luas tram and a motor vehicle on Old Belgard Road, Dublin 24, on Tuesday afternoon.

news.title: Judge allows man to withdraw guilty plea of assaulting paramedic after CCTV footage obtained
news.summary: A judge has granted an application to allow a man to withdraw his guilty plea of assault against a paramedic, after his new legal team obtained previously undisclosed footage of the incident.

news.title: Leading Irish jewellery designer pays tribute to Paul Costelloe – ‘A remarkable ambassador for Irish design’
news.summary: There was a shroud of sadness in the fashion community this week as news emerged that internationally acclaimed Irish fashion designer Paul Costelloe passed away following a short illness at the age of 80.

news.title: Becoming a mum after 45: ‘Women like me are having children a lot later in life and it is amazing’
news.summary: The average age for motherhood in Ireland is 33.2, according to the Central Statistics Office (CSO), but its most recent figures also reveal that an increasing number of women are waiting until they are a lot older before becoming first-time mothers.

news.title: Adrian Weckler: The National Broadband plan is coming in under time and on budget - where did it all go right?
news.summary: Ireland is set to finish a major national infrastructure project on time – and on or even under budget.
